证据片段: In high-purity water, containing no additives, where oxygen and oxidizing radicals are formed due to radiolysis, corrosion was found to be enhanced by a factor of 10 or more

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_033_chunk1
证据片段: In pressurized-water reactors (PWR's), where the radiolytic formation of oxygen and oxidizing radicals in the coolant is suppressed by the addition of hydrogen to the coolant, the corrosion of Zircaloy was found to be less enhanced by irradiation; an increase in corrosion by a factor of 1 to 3 has been reported

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_033_chunk1
证据片段: It was found that the waterside corrosion closely follows the ex-reactor temperature dependencies but was enhanced by a factor of between 1.2 and 3.0 when compared with the predictions of an ex-reactor corrosion model
